text: Alexander Ivanovich Pushkin (; 7 September 1907 — 20 March 1970) was a Russian ballet dancer and ballet master. His students include Askold Makarov, Nikita Dolgushin, Oleg Vinogradov, Mikhail Baryshnikov and Rudolf Nureyev.Александр Иванович Пушкин at kino-teatr.ru ==References== ==External links== *Александр Пушкин ценил Рудольфа Нуреева Category:1907 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Russian male ballet dancers Category:Ballet masters Category:Ballet teachers Category:Mariinsky Ballet dancers Category:Vaganova graduates Category:20th-century ballet dancers
title: Alexander Pushkin (ballet dancer)
